price: “Andaj, ikni (prej dënimit) drejt (shpërblimit të) Allahut, se unë vërtet që jam dërguar te ju prej Tij, si paralajmërues i qartë!
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
